game.name: DCS: Fw 190 A-8 Horrido! Campaign
game.categories: Single-player, Downloadable Content, Captions available, VR Support, Partial Controller Support
game.shortDescription: August, 1944. You arrive to Merville-Calonne to take over the leadership of 7./JG26 flying Focke Wulf 190A-8s. Most of the pilots are mere teenagers with only a few flying hours, and your job is to turn them into an efficient fighting unit under the ever-increasing pressures of the war.
game.shortDescriptionEn: August, 1944. You arrive to Merville-Calonne to take over the leadership of 7./JG26 flying Focke Wulf 190A-8s. Most of the pilots are mere teenagers with only a few flying hours, and your job is to turn them into an efficient fighting unit under the ever-increasing pressures of the war.
